files.description: Canonical single-command QA runner CLI that executes the configured QA workflow and writes only the standardized /outputs/qa/<run_id>/ artifact tree (including an explicit index) and then invokes validate_outputs.py on the produced artifacts.
Shared utilities for canonicalizing paths, generating run IDs, writing the /outputs/qa index/manifest files, and enforcing that no artifacts are written outside /outputs/qa during a run.
Documentation that defines the single canonical QA command (python scripts/qa_run.py ...) and describes the required /outputs/qa artifact structure and index files produced by that command.
Tracker page updated to reference only the canonical QA command and to treat /outputs/qa/* as the sole supported artifact location for QA evidence and validation.

missionDescription: Select the canonical entry point (prefer existing validate_outputs.py + one runner) and create/standardize one command that produces only the canonical /outputs/qa/* artifacts; update docs/tracker to point exclusively to this command.
missionSuccessCriteria: Complete strategic task identified by Meta-Coordinator or escalated by Strategic Tracker
